item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, August 28, 2024 at 4:15 AM UTC
item.description:

26. A New Wave of Underwater Comms Is Coming (53 points | 19 comments)
27. Zuckerberg claims regret on caving to White House pressure on content (505 points | 915 comments)

29. Clay (short for C Layout) is a high performance 2D UI layout library (203 points | 84 comments)
30. If Your World Is Not Enchanted, You're Not Paying Attention (88 points | 72 comments)
